MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-JAN-2021 12:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the KY8 and KY7 postcode area of Leven and Glenrothes. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore power to a number of properties and are arranging for generators to be brought to site and we now expect your supply to be restored by Midday. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:36am on 16th January 2021.
